Class ServerRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.network.server.Server
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.network.server.rmi.ServerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface, Remote
public class ServerRMI extends Server implements ServerInterface
RMI-based implementation of the server interface that delegates core logic to the ServerController

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerRMI

      public ServerRMI(ServerController serverController, int port) throws NetworkException
      Constructs a new RMI server instance, creates and exports the RMI stub, and binds it to the local registry under the name "ServerInterface".

      The method also detects the local IP address to ensure proper binding on multi-interface systems, and sets it as the system property java.rmi.server.hostname.

      Parameters:
      serverController - the game logic controller to which actions are delegated
      port - the port on which to create the RMI registry
      Throws:
      NetworkException - if the registry creation or binding fails

  • Method Details

    • registerPlayerSession

      public UUID registerPlayerSession(String username, ClientInterface playerStub) throws UsernameAlreadyTakenException
      Registers a new RMI-based player session
      Parameters:
      username - the player's unique identifier
      Returns:
      the UUID token assigned to the session
      Throws:
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown() throws Exception
      Gracefully shuts down the RMI server by unbinding the registry and unexporting the remote object.
      Specified by:
      shutdown in class Server
      Throws:
      Exception - if the shutdown procedure fails
